name: Render Manifest
description:
Render components into semantic layout slots. Use set_layout_intent FIRST to establish layout pattern.

** CRITICAL: Always call set_layout_intent before render_manifest to establish the correct layout pattern **

** SEMANTIC SLOTS (v2.0.0) **
- hero: Page header/banner (max 1 component)
- main: Primary focus content
- detail: Inspector/properties panel
- context: Supporting info/sidebars
- navigation: Menus/breadcrumbs (persistent)
- status: Notifications/alerts
- actions: Toolbars/FABs
- overlay: Modals/dialogs
- background: Ambient visuals

** COMPONENT LIFECYCLE **
- persistent: Navigation, menus (stays across intent changes)
- ephemeral: Content components (cleared on intent change)
- ambient: Notifications (auto-expire after TTL)

** WORKFLOW **
1. Call set_layout_intent({ intent: 'dashboard' })
2. Call render_manifest({ components: [...] })

slot.description:
Semantic slot for component placement:

- hero: Page header/banner (max 1 component)
- main: Primary focus content
- detail: Inspector/properties panel
- context: Supporting info/sidebars
- navigation: Menus/breadcrumbs
- status: Notifications/alerts
- actions: Toolbars/FABs
- overlay: Modals/dialogs
- background: Ambient visuals

lifecycle.description:
Component lifecycle:
- persistent: Stays until explicitly removed (navigation)
- ephemeral: Cleared on intent change (content)
- ambient: Auto-expires after TTL (notifications)

priority.description: Priority for slot capacity (higher = more important)

ttl.description: Time to live in milliseconds (for ambient lifecycle)
